Overview.Summary: Peter Pellegrini, the Speaker of Parliament and leader of the coalition party Hlas, won the Slovak presidential election with 53.12% of the vote (1). The snap parliamentary elections in Greece on June 2023 resulted in no party gaining a majority (2). Pellegrini announced his presidential bid in January 2023 and won the election in March (3,4,10). The opposition right-wing bloc won a majority in the 2022 Swedish general election (5). In December 2022, the government of Prime Minister Eduard Heger lost a no-confidence vote and a new majority administration could not be formed, leading to an early election in September 2023 (6). The official results of the December 2023 parliamentary elections in Serbia were published in January 2024 (7). By-elections were held in February 2024, resulting in a new Member of Parliament for the Kingswood constituency (8). The 2023 Thai general election saw the Royal Thai Armed Forces pledging to respect the results and a new parliament being opened by King Rama X (9).

Overview.Summary: The 2023 Slovak parliamentary election (15) resulted in a new president, Peter Pellegrini, who is also the leader of the second-biggest party in the government coalition (1,3,8,18). The election was held on March 23 (14) and a second round was held on April 6 (4). Slovakia has a history of snap elections, with the most recent being in September 2023 (15). Pellegrini's win was a surprise to many (4,19) and came after a year of political turmoil and the resignation of the previous president (16,17). Pellegrini plans to run as a pro-Western liberal opponent (11) in a country that has leaned more towards the EU in recent years (8). The election has also brought attention to other elections in Europe, such as the 2023 Spanish general election (5) and the June 2023 Greek legislative election (6,7), as well as the 2023 Thai general election (9). Pellegrini's win marks a continuation of the country's current economic policies (16,20).

Thailand holds general elections.
Spain holds a general election.
The presidential election in Slovakia is held.
